code: import React from'react';import PostCard from'./PostCard';import PostForm from'./PostForm';import{Card}from'semantic-ui-react';var Posts=function Posts(props){var postsData=props.postsData,addPost=props.addPost,deletePost=props.deletePost,addComment=props.addComment;var postsElements=postsData.map(function(post){return React.createElement(PostCard,{key:post.id,post:post,deletePost:deletePost,addComment:addComment});});return React.createElement(Card.Group,null,postsElements,React.createElement(PostForm,{onSubmit:addPost}));};export default Posts;
